resources.string: Most of the time, people are first attracted to the visual appearance of a pair of shoes, so make high-resolution photos of your shoes the focal point of your ad. Some consumers might be hesitant to buy shoes online, so including detailed images – the kinds that show you every stitch on the shoe – will give people a feel of the comfort level
